ayahs.textEN: Thereafter, when he (the boy) reached an age in which he could work with him, he (Ibrāhīm) said, “O my little son, I have seen in a dream that I am slaughtering you, so consider, what is your opinion?” He said, “O my dear father, do what you have been ordered to do. You will find me, inshā’allah , (if Allah wills) one of those who endure patiently.”

ayahs.textFR: Puis quand tous deux se furent soumis (à l'ordre d'Allah) et qu'il l'eut jeté sur le front,
ayahs.textAR: فَلَمَّا أَسْلَمَا وَتَلَّهُ لِلْجَبِينِ
ayahs.textEN: So, (it was a great episode) when both of them submitted themselves (to Allah’s will), and he laid him on his forehead (to slaughter him),

ayahs.textFR: voilà que Nous l'appelâmes «Abraham!
ayahs.textAR: وَنَادَيْنَاهُ أَنْ يَا إِبْرَاهِيمُ
ayahs.textEN: and then We called out to him, “O Ibrāhīm,

ayahs.textFR: Tu as confirmé la vision. C'est ainsi que Nous récompensons les bienfaisants».
ayahs.textAR: قَدْ صَدَّقْتَ الرُّؤْيَا ۚ إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: you did make the dream come true.” This is how We reward those who are good in their deeds.

ayahs.textFR: C'était là certes, l'épreuve manifeste.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَهُوَ الْبَلَاءُ الْمُبِينُ
ayahs.textEN: This was indeed a trial that clearly demonstrated (their obedience).

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous le rançonnâmes d'une immolation généreuse.
ayahs.textAR: وَفَدَيْنَاهُ بِذِبْحٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayahs.textEN: And We ransomed him with a great sacrifice,

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous perpétuâmes son renom dans la postérité:
ayahs.textAR: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and We left for him (a word of praise) among the later people,

ayahs.textFR: «Paix sur Abraham».
ayahs.textAR: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
ayahs.textEN: (that is,) “Salām be on Ibrāhīm!

ayahs.textFR: Ainsi récompensons-Nous les bienfaisants;
ayahs.textAR: كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: This is how We reward those who are good in their deeds.

ayahs.textFR: car il était de Nos serviteurs croyants.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Surely, he is among Our believing servants.

ayahs.textFR: Nous lui fîmes la bonne annonce d'Isaac comme prophète d'entre les gens vertueux.
ayahs.textAR: وَبَشَّرْنَاهُ بِإِسْحَاقَ نَبِيًّا مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And We gave him the good news of IsHāq (Isaac), a prophet from among the righteous.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous le bénîmes ainsi que Isaac. Parmi leurs descendances il y a [l'homme] de bien et celui qui est manifestement injuste envers lui-même.
ayahs.textAR: وَبَارَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ وَعَلَىٰ إِسْحَاقَ ۚ وَمِنْ ذُرِّيَّتِهِمَا مُحْسِنٌ وَظَالِمٌ لِنَفْسِهِ مُبِينٌ
ayahs.textEN: And We did bless him, and IsHāq. And among the progeny of both of them, some are good and some are utterly unjust to their own selves.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous accordâmes certes à Moïse et Aaron des faveurs,
ayahs.textAR: وَلَقَدْ مَنَنَّا عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Certainly We bestowed favors upon Mūsā and Hārūn,

ayahs.textFR: Et les sauvâmes ainsi que leur peuple, de la grande angoisse,
ayahs.textAR: وَنَجَّيْنَاهُمَا وَقَوْمَهُمَا مِنَ الْكَرْبِ الْعَظِيمِ
ayahs.textEN: and We delivered them and their people from the great agony,

ayahs.textFR: et les secourûmes, et ils furent eux les vainqueurs.
ayahs.textAR: وَنَصَرْنَاهُمْ فَكَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and We helped them, so they became victors,

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous leur apportâmes le livre explicite
ayahs.textAR: وَآتَيْنَاهُمَا الْكِتَابَ الْمُسْتَبِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and We gave them the clear book,

ayahs.textFR: et les guidâmes vers le droit chemin.
ayahs.textAR: وَهَدَيْنَاهُمَا الصِّرَاطَ الْمُسْتَقِيمَ
ayahs.textEN: and guided them to the straight path.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous perpétuâmes leur renom dans la postérité:
ayahs.textAR: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِمَا فِي الْآخِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And We left for them (a word of praise) among the later people,

ayahs.textFR: «Paix sur Moïse et Aaron»
ayahs.textAR: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
ayahs.textEN: (that is,) Salām be on Mūsā and Hārūn!

ayahs.textFR: Ainsi récompensons-Nous les bienfaisants;
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: This is how We reward those who are good in their deeds.

ayahs.textFR: car ils étaient du nombre de Nos serviteurs croyants.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّهُمَا مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Surely, both of them were among Our believing servants.

ayahs.textFR: Elie était, certes, du nombre des Messagers.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And surely, Ilyās is one of the messengers.

ayahs.textFR: Quand il dit à son peuple: «Ne craignez-vous pas [Allah]?»
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
ayahs.textEN: (Remember) when he said to his people: “Do you not fear Allah?

ayahs.textFR: Invoquerez-vous Ball (une idole) et délaisserez-vous le Meilleur des créateurs,
ayahs.textAR: أَتَدْعُونَ بَعْلًا وَتَذَرُونَ أَحْسَنَ الْخَالِقِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Do you invoke Ba‘l, and ignore the Best of the creators,

ayahs.textFR: Allah, votre Seigneur et le Seigneur de vos plus anciens ancêtres?»
ayahs.textAR: اللَّهَ رَبَّكُمْ وَرَبَّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: that is, Allah who is your Lord and the Lord of your forefathers?”

ayahs.textFR: Ils le traitèrent de menteur. Et bien, ils seront emmenées (au châtiment).
ayahs.textAR: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَإِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Then they rejected him. Therefore, they will be arraigned -

ayahs.textFR: Exception faite des serviteurs élus d'Allah.
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayahs.textEN: except Allah’s chosen servants.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous perpétuâmes son renom dans la postérité:
ayahs.textAR: وَتَرَكْنَا عَلَيْهِ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And We left for him (a word of praise) among the later people,

ayahs.textFR: «Paix sur Elie et ses adeptes».
ayahs.textAR: سَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ إِلْ يَاسِينَ
ayahs.textEN: (that is,) “Salām on Ilyāsīn (Ilyās).

ayahs.textFR: Ainsi récompensons-Nous les bienfaisants,
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: This is how We reward those who are good in their deeds.

ayahs.textFR: car il était du nombre de Nos serviteurs croyants.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّهُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Surely, he was from among Our believing servants.

ayahs.textFR: Et Loût était, certes, du nombre des Messagers.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ لُوطًا لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And surely, LūT is one of the messengers.

ayahs.textFR: Quand Nous le sauvâmes, lui et sa famille, tout entière,
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ نَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.textEN: (Remember) when We saved him and his family, all of them,

ayahs.textFR: sauf une vieille femme qui devait disparaître avec les autres,
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: except an old woman among those remaining behind.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous détruisîmes les autres
ayahs.textAR: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: After that, We destroyed others

ayahs.textFR: Et vous passez certainement auprès d'eux le matin
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّكُمْ لَتَمُرُّونَ عَلَيْهِمْ مُصْبِحِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and you do pass by them at daybreak

ayahs.textFR: et la nuit. Ne raisonnez-vous donc pas?
ayahs.textAR: وَبِاللَّيْلِ ۗ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: and by nightfall. Would you still not understand?

ayahs.textFR: Jonas était certes, du nombre des Messagers.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ يُونُسَ لَمِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And surely, Yūnus (Jonah) is from among the messengers.

ayahs.textFR: Quand il s'enfuit vers le bateau comble,
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ أَبَقَ إِلَى الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
ayahs.textEN: (Remember) when he ran away towards the boat that was already loaded.

ayahs.textFR: Il prit part au tirage au sort qui le désigna pour être jeté [à la mer].
ayahs.textAR: فَسَاهَمَ فَكَانَ مِنَ الْمُدْحَضِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Then he participated in drawing lots (to offload one of the passengers) and was the one who was defeated.

ayahs.textFR: Le poisson l'avala alors qu'il était blâmable.
ayahs.textAR: فَالْتَقَمَهُ الْحُوتُ وَهُوَ مُلِيمٌ
ayahs.textEN: Then the fish swallowed him while he was reproaching his own self.

ayahs.textFR: S'il n'avait pas été parmi ceux qui glorifient Allah,
ayahs.textAR: فَلَوْلَا أَنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُسَبِّحِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Had he not been of those who proclaim Allah’s purity,

ayahs.textFR: il serait demeuré dans son ventre jusqu'au jour où l'on sera ressuscité.
ayahs.textAR: لَلَبِثَ فِي بَطْنِهِ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayahs.textEN: he would have definitely lived in its belly till the day when the dead will be raised.

ayahs.textFR: Nous le jetâmes sur la terre nue, indisposé qu'il était.
ayahs.textAR: فَنَبَذْنَاهُ بِالْعَرَاءِ وَهُوَ سَقِيمٌ
ayahs.textEN: Then We cast him ashore in the open while he was ill,

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous fîmes pousser au-dessus de lui un plant de courge,
ayahs.textAR: وَأَنْبَتْنَا عَلَيْهِ شَجَرَةً مِنْ يَقْطِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: and We caused a tree of ourds to grow over him.

ayahs.textFR: et l'envoyâmes ensuite (comme prophète) vers cent mille hommes ou plus.
ayahs.textAR: وَأَرْسَلْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ مِائَةِ أَلْفٍ أَوْ يَزِيدُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And We had sent him (as messenger) to one hundred thousand, or more.

ayahs.textFR: Ils crurent, et nous leur donnâmes jouissance de la vie pour un temps.
ayahs.textAR: فَآمَنُوا فَمَتَّعْنَاهُمْ إِلَىٰ حِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: So, they believed, then, We let them enjoy for a time.

ayahs.textFR: Pose-leur donc la question: «Ton Seigneur aurait-Il des filles et eux des fils?
ayahs.textAR: فَاسْتَفْتِهِمْ أَلِرَبِّكَ الْبَنَاتُ وَلَهُمُ الْبَنُونَ
ayahs.textEN: So ask them, “Does your Lord have daughters while they have sons?”

ayahs.textFR: Ou bien avons-Nous créé des Anges de sexe féminin, et en sont-ils témoins?».
ayahs.textAR: أَمْ خَلَقْنَا الْمَلَائِكَةَ إِنَاثًا وَهُمْ شَاهِدُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Or, had We created angels as females while they were witnessing?

ayahs.textFR: Certes, ils disent dans leur mensonge:
ayahs.textAR: أَلَا إِنَّهُمْ مِنْ إِفْكِهِمْ لَيَقُولُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Beware! They are the ones who, by way of a lie of theirs, (have the audacity to) say,

ayahs.textFR: «Allah a engendré» mais ce sont certainement des menteurs!
ayahs.textAR: وَلَدَ اللَّهُ وَإِنَّهُمْ لَكَاذِبُونَ
ayahs.textEN: “Allah has children” - and they are absolute liars.

ayahs.textFR: Aurait-Il choisi des filles de préférence à des fils?
ayahs.textAR: أَصْطَفَى الْبَنَاتِ عَلَى الْبَنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Is it that Allah has chosen daughters (for Himself) instead of sons?

ayahs.textFR: Qu'avez-vous donc à juger ainsi?
ayahs.textAR: مَا لَكُمْ كَيْفَ تَحْكُمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: What is the matter with you? How (arbitrarily) do you judge?

ayahs.textFR: Ne réfléchissez-vous donc pas?
ayahs.textAR: أَفَلَا تَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Then, is it that you do not think about it?

ayahs.textFR: Ou avez-vous un argument évident?
ayahs.textAR: أَمْ لَكُمْ سُلْطَانٌ مُبِينٌ
ayahs.textEN: Or, is it that there is some open authority with you?

ayahs.textFR: Apportez donc votre Livre si vous êtes véridiques!»
ayahs.textAR: فَأْتُوا بِكِتَابِكُمْ إِنْ كُنْتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Then bring your book, if you are truthful.

ayahs.textFR: Et ils ont établi entre Lui et les djinns une parenté, alors que les djinns savent bien qu'ils [les mécréants] vont être emmenés (pour le châtiment).
ayahs.textAR: وَجَعَلُوا بَيْنَهُ وَبَيْنَ الْجِنَّةِ نَسَبًا ۚ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمَتِ الْجِنَّةُ إِنَّهُمْ لَمُحْضَرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And they have made up between Him (Allah) and the Jinns some kinship, while the Jinns already know that they are bound to be seized.-

ayahs.textFR: Gloire à Allah. Il est au-dessus de ce qu'ils décrivent!
ayahs.textAR: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayahs.textEN: -Pure is Allah from what they describe-

ayahs.textFR: Exception faite des serviteurs élus d'Allah.
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayahs.textEN: except Allah’s chosen servants.

ayahs.textFR: En vérité, vous et tout ce que vous adorez,
ayahs.textAR: فَإِنَّكُمْ وَمَا تَعْبُدُونَ
ayahs.textEN: So, you and those whom you worship,

ayahs.textFR: ne pourrez tenter [personne],
ayahs.textAR: مَا أَنْتُمْ عَلَيْهِ بِفَاتِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: none of you can make anyone turn away from Him (Allah),

ayahs.textFR: excepté celui qui sera brûlé dans la Fournaise.
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا مَنْ هُوَ صَالِ الْجَحِيمِ
ayahs.textEN: except him who is to burn in Jahannam.

ayahs.textFR: Il n'y en a pas un, parmi nous, qui n'ait une place connue;
ayahs.textAR: وَمَا مِنَّا إِلَّا لَهُ مَقَامٌ مَعْلُومٌ
ayahs.textEN: And (the angels say,) “There is no one among us who does not have a known station,

ayahs.textFR: nous sommes certes, les rangés en rangs;
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الصَّافُّونَ
ayahs.textEN: and We, surely We, are those who stand in rows

ayahs.textFR: et c'est nous certes, qui célébrons la gloire [d'Allah].
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْمُسَبِّحُونَ
ayahs.textEN: and We, surely We, are those who proclaim Allah’s purity.”

ayahs.textFR: Même s'ils disaient:
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنْ كَانُوا لَيَقُولُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And they (the pagans) used to say,

ayahs.textFR: «Si nous avions eu un Rappel de [nos] ancêtres,
ayahs.textAR: لَوْ أَنَّ عِنْدَنَا ذِكْرًا مِنَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: “Had there been a scripture with us like that of the former people,

ayahs.textFR: nous aurions été certes les serviteurs élus d'Allah!
ayahs.textAR: لَكُنَّا عِبَادَ اللَّهِ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayahs.textEN: we would have certainly been Allah’s chosen servants.”

ayahs.textFR: Ils y ont mécru et ils sauront bientôt.
ayahs.textAR: فَكَفَرُوا بِهِ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Then (once the divine book came to them,) they disbelieved in it. So, very soon they will come to know.

ayahs.textFR: En effet, Notre Parole a déjà été donnée à Nos serviteurs, les Messagers,
ayahs.textAR: وَلَقَدْ سَبَقَتْ كَلِمَتُنَا لِعِبَادِنَا الْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And Our Word has already come to pass in favor of Our servants, the messengers

ayahs.textFR: que ce sont eux qui seront secourus,
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّهُمْ لَهُمُ الْمَنْصُورُونَ
ayahs.textEN: (that) they are the ones who will be supported,

ayahs.textFR: et que Nos soldats auront le dessus.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ جُنْدَنَا لَهُمُ الْغَالِبُونَ
ayahs.textEN: and verily it is Our army (of chosen servants) that prevails.

ayahs.textFR: Eloigne-toi d'eux, jusqu'à un certain temps;
ayahs.textAR: فَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: So, withdraw your attention from them for some time.

ayahs.textFR: et observe-les: ils verront bientôt!
ayahs.textAR: وَأَبْصِرْهُمْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: But, watch them. They shall soon see (the reality).

ayahs.textFR: Quoi! est-ce Notre châtiment qu'ils cherchent à hâter?
ayahs.textAR: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Are they asking for Our punishment to come sooner?

ayahs.textFR: Quand il tombera dans leur place, ce sera alors un mauvais matin pour ceux qu'on a avertis!
ayahs.textAR: فَإِذَا نَزَلَ بِسَاحَتِهِمْ فَسَاءَ صَبَاحُ الْمُنْذَرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: So, when it will descend in their courtyard, then, evil will be the morning of those warned.

ayahs.textFR: Et éloigne-toi d'eux jusqu'à un certain temps;
ayahs.textAR: وَتَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ حَتَّىٰ حِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: So, withdraw your attention from them for some time,

ayahs.textFR: et observe; ils verront bientôt!
ayahs.textAR: وَأَبْصِرْ فَسَوْفَ يُبْصِرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: and watch. They shall soon see (the reality).

ayahs.textFR: Gloire à ton Seigneur, le Seigneur de la puissance. Il est au-dessus de ce qu'ils décrivent!
ayahs.textAR: سُبْحَانَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ الْعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Pure is your Lord, the Lord of all might and honor, from what they describe

ayahs.textFR: Et paix sur les Messagers,
ayahs.textAR: وَسَلَامٌ عَلَى الْمُرْسَلِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and Salām be on the messengers

ayahs.textFR: et louange à Allah, Seigneur de l'univers!
ayahs.textAR: وَالْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and praised is Allah, the Lord of all the worlds.

ayahs.textFR: Sâd. Par le Coran, au renom glorieux (dikr)!
ayahs.textAR: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ ص ۚ وَالْقُرْآنِ ذِي الذِّكْرِ
ayahs.textEN: Sād . I swear by the Qur’ān, (the book) containing advice, (this is true,)

ayahs.textFR: Ceux qui ont mécru sont plutôt dans l'orgueil et le schisme!
ayahs.textAR: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي عِزَّةٍ وَشِقَاقٍ
ayahs.textEN: but those who disbelieve are (involved) in false pride and opposition.

ayahs.textFR: Que de générations avant eux avons-Nous fait périr, qui ont crié, hélas, quand il n'était plus temps d'échapper?
ayahs.textAR: كَمْ أَهْلَكْنَا مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ مِنْ قَرْنٍ فَنَادَوْا وَلَاتَ حِينَ مَنَاصٍ
ayahs.textEN: How many a generation have We destroyed before them, so they cried out (for mercy), while no time was left for having any refuge.

ayahs.textFR: Et ils (les Mecquois) s'étonnèrent qu'un avertisseur parmi eux leur soit venu, et les infidèles disent: «C'est un magicien et un grand menteur,
ayahs.textAR: وَعَجِبُوا أَنْ جَاءَهُمْ مُنْذِرٌ مِنْهُمْ ۖ وَقَالَ الْكَافِرُونَ هَٰذَا سَاحِرٌ كَذَّابٌ
ayahs.textEN: They (the pagans) wonder that a warner has come to them from among themselves. And the disbelievers say, “This is a magician, a sheer liar.

ayahs.textFR: Réduira-t-il les divinités à un Seul Dieu? Voilà une chose vraiment étonnante».
ayahs.textAR: أَجَعَلَ الْآلِهَةَ إِلَٰهًا وَاحِدًا ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ عُجَابٌ
ayahs.textEN: Has he (not) turned all the gods into a single God? It is a very strange thing indeed.”

ayahs.textFR: Et leurs notables partirent en disant: «Allez-vous en, et restez constants à vos dieux: c'est là vraiment une chose souhaitable.
ayahs.textAR: وَانْطَلَقَ الْمَلَأُ مِنْهُمْ أَنِ امْشُوا وَاصْبِرُوا عَلَىٰ آلِهَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَشَيْءٌ يُرَادُ
ayahs.textEN: And the leaders among them walked out saying (to their followers), “Walk away (from the Prophet,) and stay firm on (adhering to) your gods. This (call of the Prophet) is surely something designed (for his personal benefit).

ayahs.textFR: Nous n'avons pas entendu cela dans la dernière religion (le Christianisme); ce n'est en vérité que pure invention!
ayahs.textAR: مَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي الْمِلَّةِ الْآخِرَةِ إِنْ هَٰذَا إِلَّا اخْتِلَاقٌ
ayahs.textEN: We never heard of it in the classical faith (of ours). This is nothing but a false invention.

ayahs.textFR: Quoi! C'est sur lui, parmi nous, qu'on aurait fait descendre le Rappel [le Coran]?» Plutôt ils sont dans le doute au sujet de Mon message. Ou plutôt ils n'ont pas encore goûté à Mon châtiment!
ayahs.textAR: أَأُنْزِلَ عَلَيْهِ الذِّكْرُ مِنْ بَيْنِنَا ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِنْ ذِكْرِي ۖ بَلْ لَمَّا يَذُوقُوا عَذَابِ
ayahs.textEN: Is it (believable) that the message of advice has been sent down to him (alone) from among all of us?” The fact is that they are in doubt about My message; rather, they have not yet tasted My punishment.

ayahs.textFR: Ou bien détiennent-ils les trésors de la miséricorde de ton Seigneur, le Puissant, le Dispensateur par excellence.
ayahs.textAR: أَمْ عِنْدَهُمْ خَزَائِنُ رَحْمَةِ رَبِّكَ الْعَزِيزِ الْوَهَّابِ
ayahs.textEN: Do they have the treasures of the mercy of your Lord, the Mighty, the Bountiful?

ayahs.textFR: Ou bien ont-ils le royaume des cieux et de la terre et de ce qui existe entre eux? Eh bien, qu'ils y montent par n'importe quel moyen!
ayahs.textAR: أَمْ لَهُمْ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ فَلْيَرْتَقُوا فِي الْأَسْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: Or do they have the ownership of the heavens and the earth and what lies between them? Then let them ascend (to the sky) by ropes.

ayahs.textFR: Une armée de coalisés qui, ici-même, sera mise en déroute!
ayahs.textAR: جُنْدٌ مَا هُنَالِكَ مَهْزُومٌ مِنَ الْأَحْزَابِ
ayahs.textEN: What is there (in Makkah) is just a host of the (opposing) groups that has to be defeated.

ayahs.textFR: Avant eux, le peuple de Noé, les Aad et Pharaon l'homme aux pals (ou aux Pyramides),
ayahs.textAR: كَذَّبَتْ قَبْلَهُمْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ وَعَادٌ وَفِرْعَوْنُ ذُو الْأَوْتَادِ
ayahs.textEN: Even before them, the people of NūH and ‘Ād and Fir‘aun (Pharaoh), the man of stakes,

ayahs.textFR: et les Tamûd, le peuple de Lot, et les gens d'Al-Aykah, (ont tous démenti leurs Messagers). Voilà les coalisés.
ayahs.textAR: وَثَمُودُ وَقَوْمُ لُوطٍ وَأَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الْأَحْزَابُ
ayahs.textEN: and Thamūd and the people of LūT and the people of Aaikah have rejected (the messengers). They were the (strong) groups.

ayahs.textFR: Il n'en est aucun qui n'ait traité les Messagers de menteurs. Et bien, Ma punition s'est avérée contre eux!
ayahs.textAR: إِنْ كُلٌّ إِلَّا كَذَّبَ الرُّسُلَ فَحَقَّ عِقَابِ
ayahs.textEN: All of them did nothing but declare the messengers as liars; hence, My punishment became due.

ayahs.textFR: Ceux-ci n'attendant qu'un seul Cri, sans répétition.
ayahs.textAR: وَمَا يَنْظُرُ هَٰؤُلَاءِ إِلَّا صَيْحَةً وَاحِدَةً مَا لَهَا مِنْ فَوَاقٍ
ayahs.textEN: And these people are waiting for nothing but for a single Cry (the sound of the Trumpet to be blown on Doomsday) that will have no pause.

ayahs.textFR: Et ils disent: «Seigneur, hâte-nous notre part avant le jour des Comptes».
ayahs.textAR: وَقَالُوا رَبَّنَا عَجِّلْ لَنَا قِطَّنَا قَبْلَ يَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
ayahs.textEN: And they say, “O our Lord, give us our share (of the punishment) sooner, before the Day of Reckoning.”

ayahs.textFR: Endure ce qu'ils disent; et rappelle-toi David, Notre serviteur, doué de force [dans l'adoration] et plein de repentir [à Allah].
ayahs.textAR: اصْبِرْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَقُولُونَ وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا دَاوُودَ ذَا الْأَيْدِ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
ayahs.textEN: Bear patiently with what they say, and remember Our servant Dawūd, the man of might. Surely he was ever-turning to Allah.

ayahs.textFR: Nous soumîmes les montagnes à glorifier Allah, soir et matin, en sa compagnie,
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا سَخَّرْنَا الْجِبَالَ مَعَهُ يُسَبِّحْنَ بِالْعَشِيِّ وَالْإِشْرَاقِ
ayahs.textEN: We had subjugated the mountains to join him (in) making tasbīH (i.e. pronouncing Allah’s purity) at evening and sunrise,

ayahs.textFR: de même que les oiseaux assemblés en masse, tous ne faisant qu'obéir à lui [Allah].
ayahs.textAR: وَالطَّيْرَ مَحْشُورَةً ۖ كُلٌّ لَهُ أَوَّابٌ
ayahs.textEN: and the birds as well, mustered together. All were turning to Allah with him.

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous renforçâmes son royaume et lui donnâmes la sagesse et la faculté de bien juger.
ayahs.textAR: وَشَدَدْنَا مُلْكَهُ وَآتَيْنَاهُ الْحِكْمَةَ وَفَصْلَ الْخِطَابِ
ayahs.textEN: And We made his kingdom strong, and gave him wisdom and decisive speech.

ayahs.textFR: Et t'est-elle parvenue la nouvelle des disputeurs quand ils grimpèrent au mur du sanctuaire!
ayahs.textAR: وَهَلْ أَتَاكَ نَبَأُ الْخَصْمِ إِذْ تَسَوَّرُوا الْمِحْرَابَ
ayahs.textEN: Has there come to you the story of the litigants, when they entered the sanctuary by climbing over the wall?

ayahs.textFR: Quand ils entrèrent auprès de David, il en fut effrayé. Ils dirent: «N'aie pas peur! Nous sommes tous deux en dispute; l'un de nous a fait du tort à l'autre. Juge donc en toute équité entre nous, ne sois pas injuste et guide-nous vers le chemin droit.
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ دَخَلُوا عَلَىٰ دَاوُودَ فَفَزِعَ مِنْهُمْ ۖ قَالُوا لَا تَخَفْ ۖ خَصْمَانِ بَغَىٰ بَعْضُنَا عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَنَا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تُشْطِطْ وَاهْدِنَا إِلَىٰ سَوَاءِ الصِّرَاطِ
ayahs.textEN: When they entered upon Dawūd, and he was scared of them, they said, “Be not scared. We are two litigants; one of us has wronged the other, so decide between us with truth, and do not cross the limits, and guide us to the right path.

ayahs.textFR: Celui-ci est mon frère: il a quatre-vingt-dix-neuf brebis, tandis que je n'ai qu'une brebis. Il m'a dit: «Confie-la-moi» et dans la conversation, il a beaucoup fait pression sur moi».
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّ هَٰذَا أَخِي لَهُ تِسْعٌ وَتِسْعُونَ نَعْجَةً وَلِيَ نَعْجَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ فَقَالَ أَكْفِلْنِيهَا وَعَزَّنِي فِي الْخِطَابِ
ayahs.textEN: This is my brother; he has ninety nine ewes, and I have a single ewe; still he said, ‘Give it into my charge.’ And he overpowered me in speech.”

ayahs.textFR: Il [David] dit: «Il a été certes injuste envers toi en demandant de joindre ta brebis à ses brebis». Beaucoup de gens transgressent les droits de leurs associés, sauf ceux qui croient et accomplissent les bonnes œuvres - cependant ils sont bien rares -. Et David pensa alors que Nous l'avions mis à l'épreuve. Il demanda donc pardon à son Seigneur et tomba prosterné et se repentit.
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ لَقَدْ ظَلَمَكَ بِسُؤَالِ نَعْجَتِكَ إِلَىٰ نِعَاجِهِ ۖ وَإِنَّ كَثِيرًا مِنَ الْخُلَطَاءِ لَيَبْغِي بَعْضُهُمْ عَلَىٰ بَعْضٍ إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَقَلِيلٌ مَا هُمْ ۗ وَظَنَّ دَاوُودُ أَنَّمَا فَتَنَّاهُ فَاسْتَغْفَرَ رَبَّهُ وَخَرَّ رَاكِعًا وَأَنَابَ ۩
ayahs.textEN: He (Dawūd) said, “He has certainly wronged you by demanding your ewe to be added to his ewe. Many partners oppress one another, except those who believe and do righteous deeds, and very few they are.” And Dawūd realized that We had put him to a test, so he prayed to his Lord for forgiveness, and bowing down, he fell in prostration, and turned (to Allah).

ayahs.textFR: Nous lui pardonnâmes. Il aura une place proche de Nous et un beau refuge.
ayahs.textAR: فَغَفَرْنَا لَهُ ذَٰلِكَ ۖ وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
ayahs.textEN: So we forgave him that (lapse), and surely he has a place of nearness in Our presence, and an excellent resort.

ayahs.textFR: «O David, Nous avons fait de toi un calife sur la terre. Juge donc en toute équité parmi les gens et ne suis pas la passion: sinon elle t'égarera du sentier d'Allah». Car ceux qui s'égarent du sentier d'Allah auront un dur châtiment pour avoir oublié le Jour des Comptes.
ayahs.textAR: يَا دَاوُودُ إِنَّا جَعَلْنَاكَ خَلِيفَةً فِي الْأَرْضِ فَاحْكُمْ بَيْنَ النَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا تَتَّبِعِ الْهَوَىٰ فَيُضِلَّكَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ الَّذِينَ يَضِلُّونَ عَنْ سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ شَدِيدٌ بِمَا نَسُوا يَوْمَ الْحِسَابِ
ayahs.textEN: O Dawūd, We have made you a vicegerent on earth, so judge between people with truth, and do not follow the selfish desire, lest it should lead you astray from Allah’s path. Surely those who go astray from Allah’s path will have a severe punishment, because they had forgotten the Day of Reckoning.

ayahs.textFR: Nous n'avons pas créé le ciel et la terre et ce qui existe entre eux en vain. C'est ce que pensent ceux qui ont mécru. Malheur à ceux qui ont mécru pour le feu [qui les attend]!
ayahs.textAR: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا السَّمَاءَ وَالْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا بَاطِلًا ۚ ذَٰلِكَ ظَنُّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنَ النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: We did not create the heavens and the earth and what is between them in vain. That is the thinking of those who disbelieve. So, woe to the disbelievers because of the Fire (they have to face).

ayahs.textFR: Traiterons-Nous ceux qui croient et accomplissent les bonnes œuvres comme ceux qui commettent du désordre sur terre? ou traiterons-Nous les pieux comme les pervers?
ayahs.textAR: أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ كَالْمُفْسِدِينَ فِي الْأَرْضِ أَمْ نَجْعَلُ الْمُتَّقِينَ كَالْفُجَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: Shall We make those who believe and do righteous deeds equal to those who commit mischief on the earth? Or shall We make the God-fearing equal to the sinners?

ayahs.textFR: [Voici] un Livre béni que Nous avons fait descendre vers toi, afin qu'ils méditent sur ses versets et que les doués d'intelligence réfléchissent!
ayahs.textAR: كِتَابٌ أَنْزَلْنَاهُ إِلَيْكَ مُبَارَكٌ لِيَدَّبَّرُوا آيَاتِهِ وَلِيَتَذَكَّرَ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: This is a blessed Book We have revealed to you, so that they deliberate in its verses, and so that the men of understanding may heed to advice.

ayahs.textFR: Et à David Nous fîmes don de Salomon, - quel bon serviteur! - Il était plein de repentir.
ayahs.textAR: وَوَهَبْنَا لِدَاوُودَ سُلَيْمَانَ ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
ayahs.textEN: And We blessed Dawūd with Sulaimān. He was an excellent servant (of Allah). Surely, he was great in turning (to Us, in penitence and praise).

ayahs.textFR: Quand un après-midi, on lui présenta de magnifiques chevaux de course,
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ عُرِضَ عَلَيْهِ بِالْعَشِيِّ الصَّافِنَاتُ الْجِيَادُ
ayahs.textEN: (Worth remembering is the incident) when the swift horses of high breeding were presented before him in the evening.

ayahs.textFR: il dit: «Oui, je me suis complu à aimer les biens (de ce monde) au point [d'oublier] le rappel de mon Seigneur jusqu'à ce que [le soleil] se soit caché derrière son voile.
ayahs.textAR: فَقَالَ إِنِّي أَحْبَبْتُ حُبَّ الْخَيْرِ عَنْ ذِكْرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتْ بِالْحِجَابِ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “I held the love of the good things (i.e. these horses) because of the remembrance of my Lord.” until it went behind the veil.

ayahs.textFR: Ramenez-les moi.» Alors il se mit à leur couper les pattes et les cous.
ayahs.textAR: رُدُّوهَا عَلَيَّ ۖ فَطَفِقَ مَسْحًا بِالسُّوقِ وَالْأَعْنَاقِ
ayahs.textEN: (Then he said,) “Bring them back to me” - and he started passing his hands over the shanks and the necks (of the horses).

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous avions certes éprouvé Salomon en plaçant sur son siège un corps. Ensuite, il se repentit.
ayahs.textAR: وَلَقَدْ فَتَنَّا سُلَيْمَانَ وَأَلْقَيْنَا عَلَىٰ كُرْسِيِّهِ جَسَدًا ثُمَّ أَنَابَ
ayahs.textEN: And indeed We tested Sulaimān while We threw on his throne a body after which he turned (to Us).

ayahs.textFR: Il dit: «Seigneur, pardonne-moi et fais-moi don d'un royaume tel que nul après moi n'aura de pareil. C'est Toi le grand Dispensateur».
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي وَهَبْ لِي مُلْكًا لَا يَنْبَغِي لِأَحَدٍ مِنْ بَعْدِي ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنْتَ الْوَهَّابُ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “O my Lord, forgive me, and bless me with a kingdom that will not be available to anyone after me. Surely, You are the Bountiful.”

ayahs.textFR: Nous lui assujettîmes alors le vent qui, par son ordre, soufflait modérément partout où il voulait.
ayahs.textAR: فَسَخَّرْنَا لَهُ الرِّيحَ تَجْرِي بِأَمْرِهِ رُخَاءً حَيْثُ أَصَابَ
ayahs.textEN: Then We subjugated the wind for him that blew smoothly on his command to wherever he wished,

ayahs.textFR: De même que les diables, bâtisseurs et plongeurs de toutes sortes.
ayahs.textAR: وَالشَّيَاطِينَ كُلَّ بَنَّاءٍ وَغَوَّاصٍ
ayahs.textEN: and (We subjugated to him) the devils (among Jinns), all builders and divers,

ayahs.textFR: Et d'autres encore, accouplés dans des chaînes.
ayahs.textAR: وَآخَرِينَ مُقَرَّنِينَ فِي الْأَصْفَادِ
ayahs.textEN: and many others held in chains.

ayahs.textFR: «Voilà Notre don; distribue-le ou retiens-le sans avoir à en rendre compte».
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا عَطَاؤُنَا فَامْنُنْ أَوْ أَمْسِكْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
ayahs.textEN: This is Our gift. So, do favor (to someone) or withhold (it), with no (requirement to give) account.

ayahs.textFR: Et il a une place rapprochée de Nous et un beau refuge.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ لَهُ عِنْدَنَا لَزُلْفَىٰ وَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
ayahs.textEN: He has a place of nearness in Our presence, and an excellent end.

ayahs.textFR: Et rappelle-toi Job, Notre serviteur, lorsqu'il appela son Seigneur: «Le Diable m'a infligé détresse et souffrance».
ayahs.textAR: وَاذْكُرْ عَبْدَنَا أَيُّوبَ إِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُ أَنِّي مَسَّنِيَ الشَّيْطَانُ بِنُصْبٍ وَعَذَابٍ
ayahs.textEN: And remember Our servant, Ayyūb - when he called his Lord saying, “The ShaiTān (Satan) has inflicted weariness and pain upon me.”

ayahs.textFR: Frappe [la terre] de ton pied: voici une eau fraîche pour te laver et voici de quoi boire.
ayahs.textAR: ارْكُضْ بِرِجْلِكَ ۖ هَٰذَا مُغْتَسَلٌ بَارِدٌ وَشَرَابٌ
ayahs.textEN: (Allah said to him,) “Strike (the ground) with your foot: Here is a cool water to bathe, and a drink!”

ayahs.textFR: Et Nous lui rendîmes sa famille et la fîmes deux fois plus nombreuse, comme une miséricorde de Notre part et comme un rappel pour les gens doués d'intelligence.
ayahs.textAR: وَوَهَبْنَا لَهُ أَهْلَهُ وَمِثْلَهُمْ مَعَهُمْ رَحْمَةً مِنَّا وَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: And We let him have his family and the like of them besides, as a mercy from Us, and a reminder for the people of understanding.

ayahs.textFR: «Et prends dans ta main un faisceau de brindilles, puis frappe avec cela. Et ne viole pas ton serment». Oui, Nous l'avons trouvé vraiment endurant. Quel bon serviteur! Sans cesse il se repentait.
ayahs.textAR: وَخُذْ بِيَدِكَ ضِغْثًا فَاضْرِبْ بِهِ وَلَا تَحْنَثْ ۗ إِنَّا وَجَدْنَاهُ صَابِرًا ۚ نِعْمَ الْعَبْدُ ۖ إِنَّهُ أَوَّابٌ
ayahs.textEN: And (We said to him,) “Take (a bundle of) thin twigs in your hand, and strike with it, and do not violate your oath. Surely, We found him very enduring. He was really an excellent servant. Surely, he was great in turning (to Us, in penitence and praise).

ayahs.textFR: Et rappelle-toi Abraham, Isaac et Jacob, Nos serviteurs puissants et clairvoyants.
ayahs.textAR: وَاذْكُرْ عِبَادَنَا إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَإِسْحَاقَ وَيَعْقُوبَ أُولِي الْأَيْدِي وَالْأَبْصَارِ
ayahs.textEN: And remember Our servants - Ibrāhīm and IsHāq and Ya‘qūb - the men of strength and the men of vision.

ayahs.textFR: Nous avons fait d'eux l'objet d'une distinction particulière: le rappel de l'au-delà.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا أَخْلَصْنَاهُمْ بِخَالِصَةٍ ذِكْرَى الدَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: We chose them for a trait of remembering the (eternal) Home (in the Hereafter).

ayahs.textFR: Ils sont auprès de Nous, certes, parmi les meilleurs élus.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّهُمْ عِنْدَنَا لَمِنَ الْمُصْطَفَيْنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
ayahs.textEN: And surely they are, in Our sight, among the chosen, the best of the righteous.

ayahs.textFR: Et rappelle-toi Ismaël et Elisée, et Dal Kifl, chacun d'eux parmi les meilleurs.
ayahs.textAR: وَاذْكُرْ إِسْمَاعِيلَ وَالْيَسَعَ وَذَا الْكِفْلِ ۖ وَكُلٌّ مِنَ الْأَخْيَارِ
ayahs.textEN: And remember Ismā‘īl and Al-Yasa‘ and Dhul-Kifl. Each one of them was among the best of the righteous.

ayahs.textFR: Cela est un rappel. C'est aux pieux qu'appartient, en vérité, la meilleure retraite,
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا ذِكْرٌ ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسْنَ مَآبٍ
ayahs.textEN: This is a reminder (of what has passed). And surely the God-fearing will have the best place to return:

ayahs.textFR: Les Jardins d'Eden, aux portes ouvertes pour eux,
ayahs.textAR: جَنَّاتِ عَدْنٍ مُفَتَّحَةً لَهُمُ الْأَبْوَابُ
ayahs.textEN: - everlasting gardens, with (their) doors opened for them.

ayahs.textFR: où, accoudés, ils demanderont des fruits abondants et des boissons.
ayahs.textAR: مُتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا يَدْعُونَ فِيهَا بِفَاكِهَةٍ كَثِيرَةٍ وَشَرَابٍ
ayahs.textEN: They will be relaxing in it, calling there for plenteous fruits and drinks;

ayahs.textFR: Et auprès d'eux seront les belles au regard chaste, toutes du même âge.
ayahs.textAR: وَعِنْدَهُمْ قَاصِرَاتُ الطَّرْفِ أَتْرَابٌ
ayahs.textEN: and in their company there will be females restricting their glances (to their husbands, and) of matching ages.

ayahs.textFR: Voilà ce qui vous est promis pour le Jour des Comptes.
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا مَا تُوعَدُونَ لِيَوْمِ الْحِسَابِ
ayahs.textEN: This is what you are being promised for the Day of Reckoning.

ayahs.textFR: Ce sera Notre attribution inépuisable.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّ هَٰذَا لَرِزْقُنَا مَا لَهُ مِنْ نَفَادٍ
ayahs.textEN: Surely, that is provision provided by Us, to which there is no end.

ayahs.textFR: Voilà! Alors que les rebelles auront certes la pire retraite,
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا ۚ وَإِنَّ لِلطَّاغِينَ لَشَرَّ مَآبٍ
ayahs.textEN: Having said this, the transgressors will surely have the most evil place to return:

ayahs.textFR: L'Enfer où ils brûleront. Et quel affreux lit!
ayahs.textAR: جَهَنَّمَ يَصْلَوْنَهَا فَبِئْسَ الْمِهَادُ
ayahs.textEN: the Jahannam , in which they will enter. So, how evil is that place to rest?

ayahs.textFR: Voilà! Qu'ils y goûtent: eau bouillante et eau purulente,
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا فَلْيَذُوقُوهُ حَمِيمٌ وَغَسَّاقٌ
ayahs.textEN: Let them taste this: hot water and pus,

ayahs.textFR: et d'autres punitions du même genre.
ayahs.textAR: وَآخَرُ مِنْ شَكْلِهِ أَزْوَاجٌ
ayahs.textEN: and other things similar to it of various kinds.

ayahs.textFR: Voici un groupe qui entre précipitamment en même temps que vous, nulle bienvenue à eux. Ils vont brûler dans le Feu.
ayahs.textAR: هَٰذَا فَوْجٌ مُقْتَحِمٌ مَعَكُمْ ۖ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِهِمْ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ صَالُو النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: (When the leaders of the infidels will see their followers entering the Hell after them, they will say to each other,) “This is a multitude rushing into (the Hell) with you - they are not welcome - they are to burn in the Fire.”

ayahs.textFR: Ils dirent: «Pas de bienvenue pour vous, plutôt. C'est vous qui avez préparé cela pour nous». Quel mauvais lieu de séjour!
ayahs.textAR: قَالُوا بَلْ أَنْتُمْ لَا مَرْحَبًا بِكُمْ ۖ أَنْتُمْ قَدَّمْتُمُوهُ لَنَا ۖ فَبِئْسَ الْقَرَارُ
ayahs.textEN: They (the followers) will say (to their leaders) “No, it is you who are not welcome; you are the ones who brought this upon us.” So, how evil is the place to stay (for ever)!”

ayahs.textFR: Ils dirent: «Seigneur, celui qui nous a préparé cela, ajoute-lui un double châtiment dans le Feu».
ayahs.textAR: قَالُوا رَبَّنَا مَنْ قَدَّمَ لَنَا هَٰذَا فَزِدْهُ عَذَابًا ضِعْفًا فِي النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: They (the followers) will say, “Our Lord, whoever has brought this on us, do increase his punishment twofold in the Fire.”

ayahs.textFR: Et ils dirent: «Pourquoi ne voyons-nous pas des gens que nous comptions parmi les malfaiteurs?
ayahs.textAR: وَقَالُوا مَا لَنَا لَا نَرَىٰ رِجَالًا كُنَّا نَعُدُّهُمْ مِنَ الْأَشْرَارِ
ayahs.textEN: And they (the infidels) will say, “What is the matter with us that we do not see those men (here in Hell) whom we used to count amongst the worst? (i.e the Muslims whom the infidels used to treat as the worst people among them)

ayahs.textFR: Est-ce que nous les avons raillés (à tort) ou échappent-ils à nos regards?»
ayahs.textAR: أَتَّخَذْنَاهُمْ سِخْرِيًّا أَمْ زَاغَتْ عَنْهُمُ الْأَبْصَارُ
ayahs.textEN: Had we taken them as a laughing-stock (unjustly), or have our eyes missed them?”

ayahs.textFR: Telles sont en vérité les querelles des gens du Feu.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَحَقٌّ تَخَاصُمُ أَهْلِ النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: That is going to happen definitely, that is, the mutual quarrel of the people of the Fire.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Je ne suis qu'un avertisseur. Point de divinité à part Allah, l'Unique, le Dominateur Suprême,
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مُنْذِرٌ ۖ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَٰهٍ إِلَّا اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “I am only a warner, and there is no god but Allah, the One, the All-Dominant,

ayahs.textFR: Seigneur des cieux et de la terre et de ce qui existe entre eux, le Puissant, le Grand Pardonneur».
ayahs.textAR: رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
ayahs.textEN: the Lord of the heavens and the earth and what is between them, the Mighty, the Very-Forgiving.”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Ceci (le Coran) est une grande nouvelle,
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ هُوَ نَبَأٌ عَظِيمٌ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “It is a great news

ayahs.textFR: mais vous vous en détournez.
ayahs.textAR: أَنْتُمْ عَنْهُ مُعْرِضُونَ
ayahs.textEN: to which you are averse.

ayahs.textFR: Je n'avais aucune connaissance de la cohorte sublime au moment où elle disputait.
ayahs.textAR: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنْ عِلْمٍ بِالْمَلَإِ الْأَعْلَىٰ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: I had no knowledge of the Heavenly Beings when they were debating (about the creation of ’Ādam).

ayahs.textFR: Il m'est seulement révélé que je suis un avertisseur clair».
ayahs.textAR: إِنْ يُوحَىٰ إِلَيَّ إِلَّا أَنَّمَا أَنَا نَذِيرٌ مُبِينٌ
ayahs.textEN: Revelation is sent to me only because I am a plain warner.

ayahs.textFR: Quand ton Seigneur dit aux Anges: «Je vais créer d'argile un être humain.
ayahs.textAR: إِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَائِكَةِ إِنِّي خَالِقٌ بَشَرًا مِنْ طِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: When your Lord said to the angels, “I am going to create man from clay.

ayahs.textFR: Quand Je l'aurai bien formé et lui aurai insufflé de Mon Esprit, jetez-vous devant lui, prosternés».
ayahs.textAR: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِنْ رُوحِي فَقَعُوا لَهُ سَاجِدِينَ
ayahs.textEN: So, once I make him perfectly and breath My spirit into him, you must fall down in prostration before him.”

ayahs.textFR: Alors tous les Anges se prosternèrent,
ayahs.textAR: فَسَجَدَ الْمَلَائِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Then, the angels prostrated themselves, all of them together -

ayahs.textFR: à l'exception d'Iblîs qui s'enfla d'orgueil et fut du nombre des infidèles.
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا إِبْلِيسَ اسْتَكْبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: except Iblīs (Satan). He waxed proud, and became one of the disbelievers.

ayahs.textFR: (Allah) lui dit: «O Iblîs, qui t'a empêché de te prosterner devant ce que J'ai créé de Mes mains? T'enfles-tu d'orgueil ou te considères-tu parmi les hauts placés?»
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ يَا إِبْلِيسُ مَا مَنَعَكَ أَنْ تَسْجُدَ لِمَا خَلَقْتُ بِيَدَيَّ ۖ أَسْتَكْبَرْتَ أَمْ كُنْتَ مِنَ الْعَالِينَ
ayahs.textEN: He (Allah) said, “O Iblīs, what did prevent you from prostrating yourself before what I created with My hands? Did you wax proud or were you among the lofty ones?”

ayahs.textFR: «Je suis meilleur que lui, dit [Iblîs,] Tu m'as créé de feu et tu l'as créé d'argile».
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ أَنَا خَيْرٌ مِنْهُ ۖ خَلَقْتَنِي مِنْ نَارٍ وَخَلَقْتَهُ مِنْ طِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “I am better than him. You created me from fire, and created him from clay.”

ayahs.textFR: (Allah) dit: «Sors d'ici, te voilà banni;
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ فَاخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “Then, get out from here, for you are accursed,

ayahs.textFR: et sur toi sera ma malédiction jusqu'au jour de la Rétribution».
ayahs.textAR: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الدِّينِ
ayahs.textEN: and on you shall remain My curse till the Day of Judgment.”

ayahs.textFR: «Seigneur, dit [Iblîs], donne-moi donc un délai, jusqu'au jour où ils seront ressuscités».
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنْظِرْنِي إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “O my Lord, then give me respite till the day they are raised again.”

ayahs.textFR: (Allah) dit: «Tu es de ceux à qui un délai est accordé,
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ الْمُنْظَرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “Then, you have been given respite,

ayahs.textFR: jusqu'au jour de l'Instant bien Connu».
ayahs.textAR: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ الْوَقْتِ الْمَعْلُومِ
ayahs.textEN: until the Day of the Appointed Time.”

ayahs.textFR: «Par Ta puissance! dit [Satan]. Je les séduirai assurément tous,
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ فَبِعِزَّتِكَ لَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.textEN: He said, “Then, I swear by Your Might, that I will definitely lead them astray, all of them -

ayahs.textFR: sauf Tes serviteurs élus parmi eux».
ayahs.textAR: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ الْمُخْلَصِينَ
ayahs.textEN: except Your chosen servants among them.”

ayahs.textFR: (Allah) dit: «En vérité, et c'est la vérité que je dis,
ayahs.textAR: قَالَ فَالْحَقُّ وَالْحَقَّ أَقُولُ
ayahs.textEN: He (Allah) said, “Then, the truth is-and it is (always) the truth that I speak-

ayahs.textFR: J'emplirai certainement l'Enfer de toi et de tous ceux d'entre eux qui te suivront».
ayahs.textAR: لَأَمْلَأَنَّ جَهَنَّمَ مِنْكَ وَمِمَّنْ تَبِعَكَ مِنْهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
ayahs.textEN: that I will definitely fill the Jahannam with you and with those who will follow you from among them, all together.”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Pour cela, je ne vous demande aucun salaire; et je ne suis pas un imposteur.
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ مَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ وَمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُتَكَلِّفِينَ
ayahs.textEN: Say (O Prophet to the unbelievers,) “I do not demand from you any fee for it, nor am I from among those who make up things artificially.

ayahs.textFR: Ceci [le Coran] n'est qu'un rappel à l'univers.
ayahs.textAR: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِلْعَالَمِينَ
ayahs.textEN: It is nothing but an advice for all the worlds.

ayahs.textFR: Et certainement vous en aurez des nouvelles bientôt!»
ayahs.textAR: وَلَتَعْلَمُنَّ نَبَأَهُ بَعْدَ حِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: And you will come to know its reality after a while.”

ayahs.textFR: La révélation du Livre vient d'Allah, le Puissant, le Sage.
ayahs.textAR: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَنْزِيلُ الْكِتَابِ مِنَ اللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَكِيمِ
ayahs.textEN: This is the revelation of the Book from Allah, the Mighty, the Wise.

ayahs.textFR: Nous t'avons fait descendre le Livre en toute vérité. Adore donc Allah en Lui vouant un culte exclusif.
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَا إِلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ بِالْحَقِّ فَاعْبُدِ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ الدِّينَ
ayahs.textEN: Surely We have revealed the Book to you with truth; so worship Allah making your submission exclusive for Him.

ayahs.textFR: C'est à Allah qu'appartient la religion pure. Tandis que ceux qui prennent des protecteurs en dehors de Lui (disent): «Nous ne les adorons que pour qu'ils nous rapprochent davantage d'Allah». En vérité, Allah jugera parmi eux sur ce en quoi ils divergent. Allah ne guide pas celui qui est menteur et grand ingrat.
ayahs.textAR: أَلَا لِلَّهِ الدِّينُ الْخَالِصُ ۚ وَالَّذِينَ اتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِهِ أَوْلِيَاءَ مَا نَعْبُدُهُمْ إِلَّا لِيُقَرِّبُونَا إِلَى اللَّهِ زُلْفَىٰ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَحْكُمُ بَيْنَهُمْ فِي مَا هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ ۗ إِنَّ اللَّهَ لَا يَهْدِي مَنْ هُوَ كَاذِبٌ كَفَّارٌ
ayahs.textEN: Remember, Allah alone deserves the exclusive submission. As for those who have adopted guardians other than Him (saying), “We worship them for no other reason but because they would bring us near to Allah closely”, Allah will judge between them in the matters in which they are differing. Surely, Allah does not guide anyone who is liar, highly infidel.

ayahs.textFR: Si Allah avait voulu S'attribuer un enfant, Il aurait certes choisi ce qu'Il eût voulu parmi ce qu'Il crée. Gloire à Lui! C'est Lui Allah, l'Unique, le Dominateur suprême.
ayahs.textAR: لَوْ أَرَادَ اللَّهُ أَنْ يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدًا لَاصْطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَاءُ ۚ سُبْحَانَهُ ۖ هُوَ اللَّهُ الْوَاحِدُ الْقَهَّارُ
ayahs.textEN: Had Allah opted to have a son of His own, He would have definitely chosen anyone, as He wished, out of what He had created. (But), Pure is He. He is Allah, the Only One, the All-Dominant.

ayahs.textFR: Il a créé les cieux et la terre en toute vérité. Il enroule la nuit sur le jour et enroule le jour sur la nuit, et Il a assujetti le soleil et la lune à poursuivre chacun sa course pour un terme fixé. C'est bien Lui le Puissant, le Grand Pardonneur!
ayahs.textAR: خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ يُكَوِّرُ اللَّيْلَ عَلَى النَّهَارِ وَيُكَوِّرُ النَّهَارَ عَلَى اللَّيْلِ ۖ وَسَخَّرَ الشَّمْسَ وَالْقَمَرَ ۖ كُلٌّ يَجْرِي لِأَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۗ أَلَا هُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْغَفَّارُ
ayahs.textEN: He created the heavens and the earth for just purpose. He wraps the night over the day and He wraps the day over the night, and He has put the sun and the moon under His command, each one of them moving for an appointed term. Remember, He is the Mighty, the Most-Forgiving.

ayahs.textFR: Il vous a créés d'une personne unique et a tiré d'elle son épouse. Et Il a fait descendre [créé] pour vous huit couples de bestiaux. Il vous crée dans les ventres de vos mères, création après création, dans trois ténèbres. Tel est Allah, votre Seigneur! A Lui appartient toute la Royauté. Point de divinité à part Lui. Comment pouvez-vous vous détourner [de son culte]?
ayahs.textAR: خَلَقَكُمْ مِنْ نَفْسٍ وَاحِدَةٍ ثُمَّ جَعَلَ مِنْهَا زَوْجَهَا وَأَنْزَلَ لَكُمْ مِنَ الْأَنْعَامِ ثَمَانِيَةَ أَزْوَاجٍ ۚ يَخْلُقُكُمْ فِي بُطُونِ أُمَّهَاتِكُمْ خَلْقًا مِنْ بَعْدِ خَلْقٍ فِي ظُلُمَاتٍ ثَلَاثٍ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ اللَّهُ رَبُّكُمْ لَهُ الْمُلْكُ ۖ لَا إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُصْرَفُونَ
ayahs.textEN: He created you from a single person, then (once this person was created,) He made his match from him, and sent down for you eight pairs of the cattle. He creates you in the wombs of your mothers, creation after creation, in three layers of darkness. That is your Allah, your Lord. To Him belongs the whole Kingdom. There is no god but He. Then, to where are you being diverted (by your whims)?

ayahs.textFR: Si vous ne croyez pas, Allah se passe largement de vous. De Ses serviteurs cependant, Il n'agrée pas la mécréance. Et si vous êtes reconnaissants, Il l'agrée pour vous. Nul pécheur ne portera les péchés d'autrui. Ensuite, vers votre Seigneur sera votre retour: Il vous informera alors de ce que vous faisiez car Il connaît parfaitement le contenu des poitrines.
ayahs.textAR: إِنْ تَكْفُرُوا فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ غَنِيٌّ عَنْكُمْ ۖ وَلَا يَرْضَىٰ لِعِبَادِهِ الْكُفْرَ ۖ وَإِنْ تَشْكُرُوا يَرْضَهُ لَكُمْ ۗ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۗ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُمْ بِمَا كُنْتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ ۚ إِنَّهُ عَلِيمٌ بِذَاتِ الصُّدُورِ
ayahs.textEN: If you disbelieve, then, Allah does not need you at all, however He does not like for His servants to be disbelievers; and if you are grateful, He will like it for you. No one will bear the burden of someone else. Then, to your Lord is your return; so He will tell you about what you used to do. He is aware of whatever lies in the hearts.

ayahs.textFR: Et quand un malheur touche l'homme, il appelle son Seigneur en se tournant vers Lui. Puis quand Il lui accorde de Sa part un bienfait, il oublie la raison pour laquelle il faisait appel, et il assigne à Allah des égaux, afin d'égarer (les gens) de son chemin. Dis «Jouis de ta mécréance un court moment. Tu fais partie des gens du Feu».
ayahs.textAR: وَإِذَا مَسَّ الْإِنْسَانَ ضُرٌّ دَعَا رَبَّهُ مُنِيبًا إِلَيْهِ ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلَهُ نِعْمَةً مِنْهُ نَسِيَ مَا كَانَ يَدْعُو إِلَيْهِ مِنْ قَبْلُ وَجَعَلَ لِلَّهِ أَنْدَادًا لِيُضِلَّ عَنْ سَبِيلِهِ ۚ قُلْ تَمَتَّعْ بِكُفْرِكَ قَلِيلًا ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنْ أَصْحَابِ النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: And when man is afflicted by pain, he calls his Lord turning to Him passionately. Thereafter, when He blesses him with some favor from Him, he forgets that for which he was calling Him earlier, and sets up partners for Allah, so that he leads others astray from His way. Say, “Enjoy (the pleasure of) your disbelief for a while, (then) surely, you are from among the people of the Fire.”

ayahs.textFR: Est-ce que celui qui, aux heures de la nuit, reste en dévotion, prosterné et debout, prenant garde à l'au-delà et espérant la miséricorde de son Seigneur... Dis: «Sont-ils égaux, ceux qui savent et ceux qui ne savent pas?» Seuls les doués d'intelligence se rappellent.
ayahs.textAR: أَمَّنْ هُوَ قَانِتٌ آنَاءَ اللَّيْلِ سَاجِدًا وَقَائِمًا يَحْذَرُ الْآخِرَةَ وَيَرْجُو رَحْمَةَ رَبِّهِ ۗ قُلْ هَلْ يَسْتَوِي الَّذِينَ يَعْلَمُونَ وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ ۗ إِنَّمَا يَتَذَكَّرُ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: Can (such people be equal to) the one who worships during the hours of night, prostrating himself and standing, fearing the Hereafter and having hopes in his Lord’s mercy? Say, “Can those who know and those who do not know become equal?” It is only the people of understanding who are receptive of the advice.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «O Mes serviteurs qui avez cru! Craignez votre Seigneur». Ceux qui ici-bas font le bien, auront une bonne [récompense]. La terre d'Allah est vaste et les endurants auront leur pleine récompense sans compter.
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا اتَّقُوا رَبَّكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ أَحْسَنُوا فِي هَٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةٌ ۗ وَأَرْضُ اللَّهِ وَاسِعَةٌ ۗ إِنَّمَا يُوَفَّى الصَّابِرُونَ أَجْرَهُمْ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
ayahs.textEN: Say (on My behalf) “O My servants who believe, fear your Lord. Those who do good deeds in this world will have a good return, and the earth of Allah is wide. Certainly those who observe patience will be given their reward in full without measure.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Il m'a été ordonné d'adorer Allah en Lui vouant exclusivement le culte,
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ إِنِّي أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ اللَّهَ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ الدِّينَ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “I have been ordered to worship Allah, making my submission exclusive to Him.

ayahs.textFR: et il m'a été ordonné d'être le premier des Musulmans.
ayahs.textAR: وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَنْ أَكُونَ أَوَّلَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And I have been ordered to be the first of those who submit.”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Je crains, si je désobéis à mon Seigneur, le châtiment d'un jour terrible».
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ إِنِّي أَخَافُ إِنْ عَصَيْتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “If I were to disobey my Lord, I fear the punishment of a great day.”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «C'est Allah que j'adore, et Lui voue exclusivement mon culte.
ayahs.textAR: قُلِ اللَّهَ أَعْبُدُ مُخْلِصًا لَهُ دِينِي
ayahs.textEN: Say, “It is Allah whom I worship, making my submission exclusive to Him.

ayahs.textFR: Adorez donc, en dehors de Lui, qui vous voudrez!» - Dis: «Les perdants sont ceux qui, au Jour de la Résurrection, auront causé la perte de leurs propres âmes et celles de leurs familles». C'est bien cela la perte évidente.
ayahs.textAR: فَاعْبُدُوا مَا شِئْتُمْ مِنْ دُونِهِ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ الْخَاسِرِينَ الَّذِينَ خَسِرُوا أَنْفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۗ أَلَا ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ الْخُسْرَانُ الْمُبِينُ
ayahs.textEN: So, worship what you wish other than Him.” Say, “Indeed, the losers are those who (will) lose their selves and their people on the Day of Judgment. Beware, that is really the obvious loss.”

ayahs.textFR: Au-dessus d'eux ils auront des couches de feu et des couches au-dessous d'eux. Voilà ce dont Allah menace Ses esclaves. «O Mes esclaves, craignez-Moi donc!»
ayahs.textAR: لَهُمْ مِنْ فَوْقِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ مِنَ النَّارِ وَمِنْ تَحْتِهِمْ ظُلَلٌ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ يُخَوِّفُ اللَّهُ بِهِ عِبَادَهُ ۚ يَا عِبَادِ فَاتَّقُونِ
ayahs.textEN: For them there are canopies of fire on top of them and canopies (of fire) underneath them. That is the thing against which Allah warns His servants. “So, O servants of Mine, fear Me.”

ayahs.textFR: Et à ceux qui s'écartent des Taghût pour ne pas les adorer, tandis qu'ils reviennent à Allah, à eux la bonne nouvelle! Annonce la bonne nouvelle à Mes serviteurs
ayahs.textAR: وَالَّذِينَ اجْتَنَبُوا الطَّاغُوتَ أَنْ يَعْبُدُوهَا وَأَنَابُوا إِلَى اللَّهِ لَهُمُ الْبُشْرَىٰ ۚ فَبَشِّرْ عِبَادِ
ayahs.textEN: And those who abstain from worshipping the Tāghūt and turn fervently to Allah, for them there is good news. So, give the good news to My servants

ayahs.textFR: qui prêtent l'oreille à la Parole, puis suivent ce qu'elle contient de meilleur. Ce sont ceux-là qu'Allah a guidés et ce sont eux les doués d'intelligence!
ayahs.textAR: الَّذِينَ يَسْتَمِعُونَ الْقَوْلَ فَيَتَّبِعُونَ أَحْسَنَهُ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ هَدَاهُمُ اللَّهُ ۖ وَأُولَٰئِكَ هُمْ أُولُو الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: who listen to what is said, then, follow the best of it. Those are the ones whom Allah has guided, and those are the ones who possess understanding.

ayahs.textFR: Et bien quoi! Celui contre qui s'avère le décret du châtiment,... est-ce que tu sauves celui qui est dans le Feu?
ayahs.textAR: أَفَمَنْ حَقَّ عَلَيْهِ كَلِمَةُ الْعَذَابِ أَفَأَنْتَ تُنْقِذُ مَنْ فِي النَّارِ
ayahs.textEN: So tell Me about the one for whom the word of punishment is destined, - is it you, then, who would save someone who is already in the Fire?

ayahs.textFR: Mais ceux qui auront craint leur Seigneur auront [pour demeure] des étages [au Paradis] au-dessus desquels d'autres étages sont construits et sous lesquels coulent les rivières. Promesse d'Allah! Allah ne manque pas à Sa promesse.
ayahs.textAR: لَٰكِنِ الَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا رَبَّهُمْ لَهُمْ غُرَفٌ مِنْ فَوْقِهَا غُرَفٌ مَبْنِيَّةٌ تَجْرِي مِنْ تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۖ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ ۖ لَا يُخْلِفُ اللَّهُ الْمِيعَادَ
ayahs.textEN: But, for those who fear their Lord, there are chambers with chambers built on top of them, with rivers running from underneath them. This is Allah’s promise. Allah does not go back on any promise.

ayahs.textFR: Ne vois-tu pas qu'Allah fait descendre du ciel de l'eau, puis Il l'achemine vers des sources dans la terre; ensuite avec cela, Il fait sortir une culture aux couleurs diverses, laquelle se fane ensuite, de sorte que tu la vois jaunie; ensuite, Il la réduit en miettes. C'est là certainement un rappel aux [gens] doués d'intelligence.
ayahs.textAR: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّ اللَّهَ أَنْزَلَ مِنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَسَلَكَهُ يَنَابِيعَ فِي الْأَرْضِ ثُمَّ يُخْرِجُ بِهِ زَرْعًا مُخْتَلِفًا أَلْوَانُهُ ثُمَّ يَهِيجُ فَتَرَاهُ مُصْفَرًّا ثُمَّ يَجْعَلُهُ حُطَامًا ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَذِكْرَىٰ لِأُولِي الْأَلْبَابِ
ayahs.textEN: Have you not seen that Allah sent down water from the sky, then made it penetrate into the earth (and gush forth) in the form of springs? Then He brings forth with it crops of different colors, and afterwards they wither, and you see them turned yellow, then He makes them chaff. Surely in that there is a lesson for the people of understanding.

ayahs.textFR: Est-ce que celui dont Allah ouvre la poitrine à l'Islam et qui détient ainsi une lumière venant de Son Seigneur... Malheur donc à ceux dont les cœurs sont endurcis contre le rappel d'Allah. Ceux-là sont dans un égarement évident.
ayahs.textAR: أَفَمَنْ شَرَحَ اللَّهُ صَدْرَهُ لِلْإِسْلَامِ فَهُوَ عَلَىٰ نُورٍ مِنْ رَبِّهِ ۚ فَوَيْلٌ لِلْقَاسِيَةِ قُلُوبُهُمْ مِنْ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ أُولَٰئِكَ فِي ضَلَالٍ مُبِينٍ
ayahs.textEN: So I ask about a person whose heart Allah has opened up for Islam, and consequently he proceeds in a light from his Lord. (Can he be equal to the one whose heart is hardened?) So, woe to those whose hearts are too hard to remember Allah. Those are wandering in open error.

ayahs.textFR: Allah a fait descendre le plus beau des récits, un Livre dont [certains versets] se ressemblent et se répètent. Les peaux de ceux qui redoutent leur Seigneur frissonnent (à l'entendre); puis leurs peaux et leurs cœurs s'apaisent au rappel d'Allah. Voilà le [Livre] guide d'Allah par lequel Il guide qui Il veut. Mais quiconque Allah égare n'a point de guide.
ayahs.textAR: اللَّهُ نَزَّلَ أَحْسَنَ الْحَدِيثِ كِتَابًا مُتَشَابِهًا مَثَانِيَ تَقْشَعِرُّ مِنْهُ جُلُودُ الَّذِينَ يَخْشَوْنَ رَبَّهُمْ ثُمَّ تَلِينُ جُلُودُهُمْ وَقُلُوبُهُمْ إِلَىٰ ذِكْرِ اللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُدَى اللَّهِ يَهْدِي بِهِ مَنْ يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَنْ يُضْلِلِ اللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ هَادٍ
ayahs.textEN: Allah has sent down the best discourse, a book containing subjects resembling each other, mentioned again and again, shivered from which are the skins of those who have awe of their Lord. Then, their skins and their hearts become soft enough to tend to the remembrance of Allah. This is the Guidance of Allah with which He brings to the right path whomsoever He wills. As for the one whom Allah lets go astray, for him there is no one to guide.

ayahs.textFR: Est-ce que celui qui, au Jour de la Résurrection, se sera protégé le visage contre le pire châtiment... Et l'on dira aux injustes: «Goûtez à ce que vous avez acquis».
ayahs.textAR: أَفَمَنْ يَتَّقِي بِوَجْهِهِ سُوءَ الْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۚ وَقِيلَ لِلظَّالِمِينَ ذُوقُوا مَا كُنْتُمْ تَكْسِبُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Tell Me about the one who tries to save himself from the worst punishment with his face on the Day of Judgment, (whether he is equal to the one who is not liable to any punishment.) And it will be said to the wrongdoers, “Have a taste of what you used to earn.”

ayahs.textFR: Ceux qui ont vécu avant eux ont démenti (les Messagers), le châtiment leur est venu par où ils ne le pressentaient pas.
ayahs.textAR: كَذَّبَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ فَأَتَاهُمُ الْعَذَابُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Those before them had also rejected (the messengers) and consequently, the punishment came upon them in a way that they had never imagined.

ayahs.textFR: Allah leur a fait goûter l'ignominie dans la vie présente. Le châtiment de l'au-delà, cependant, est plus grand, si seulement ils savaient!
ayahs.textAR: فَأَذَاقَهُمُ اللَّهُ الْخِزْيَ فِي الْحَيَاةِ الدُّنْيَا ۖ وَلَعَذَابُ الْآخِرَةِ أَكْبَرُ ۚ لَوْ كَانُوا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Then Allah made them taste disgrace in the worldly life, and of course the punishment of the Hereafter is much greater. Only if they knew!

ayahs.textFR: Nous avons, dans ce Coran, cité pour les gens des exemples de toutes sortes afin qu'ils se souviennent.
ayahs.textAR: وَلَقَدْ ضَرَبْنَا لِلنَّاسِ فِي هَٰذَا الْقُرْآنِ مِنْ كُلِّ مَثَلٍ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And We have cited for people all sorts of examples in this Qur’ān, so that they may receive the message

ayahs.textFR: Un Coran [en langue] arabe, dénué de tortuosité, afin qu'ils soient pieux!
ayahs.textAR: قُرْآنًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيْرَ ذِي عِوَجٍ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَّقُونَ
ayahs.textEN: through an Arabic Qur’ān that has no digression (from the truth), so that they may be God-fearing.

ayahs.textFR: Allah a cité comme parabole un homme appartenant à des associés se querellant à son sujet et un [autre] homme appartenant à un seul homme: sont-ils égaux en exemple? Louanges à Allah! Mais la plupart d'entre eux ne savent pas.
ayahs.textAR: ضَرَبَ اللَّهُ مَثَلًا رَجُلًا فِيهِ شُرَكَاءُ مُتَشَاكِسُونَ وَرَجُلًا سَلَمًا لِرَجُلٍ هَلْ يَسْتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًا ۚ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Allah has given an example: There is a man (enslaved and) owned by some partners having rivalry with each other, and (on the other hand,) there is a man solely owned by a single man. Can they be equal in comparison? Praise be to Allah! (The truth stands established). But, most of them do not know.

ayahs.textFR: En vérité tu mourras et ils mourront eux aussi;
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّكَ مَيِّتٌ وَإِنَّهُمْ مَيِّتُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Verily, you are to die and they are to die.

ayahs.textFR: ensuite, au Jour de la Résurrection, vous vous disputerez auprès de votre Seigneur.
ayahs.textAR: ثُمَّ إِنَّكُمْ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ عِنْدَ رَبِّكُمْ تَخْتَصِمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: After that, on the Day of Doom, you will surely place your disputes before your Lord.

ayahs.textFR: Quel pire injuste donc, que celui qui ment contre Allah et qui traite de mensonge la vérité quand elle lui vient? N'est-ce pas dans l'Enfer qu'il y a un refuge pour les mécréants?
ayahs.textAR: فَمَنْ أَظْلَمُ مِمَّنْ كَذَبَ عَلَى اللَّهِ وَكَذَّبَ بِالصِّدْقِ إِذْ جَاءَهُ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِلْكَافِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: So, who is more unjust than him who forges a lie against Allah and rejects the truth when it reached him? Is it not that in Jahannam (Hell) there is an abode for the disbelievers?

ayahs.textFR: Tandis que celui qui vient avec la vérité et celui qui la confirme, ceux-là sont les pieux.
ayahs.textAR: وَالَّذِي جَاءَ بِالصِّدْقِ وَصَدَّقَ بِهِ ۙ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْمُتَّقُونَ
ayahs.textEN: As for the one who has come with the truth and believed it to be true, then such people are the ones who are God-fearing.

ayahs.textFR: Ils auront tout ce qu'ils désireront auprès de leur Seigneur; voilà la récompense des bienfaisants,
ayahs.textAR: لَهُمْ مَا يَشَاءُونَ عِنْدَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ جَزَاءُ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: For them, with their Lord, there is what they wish. That is the reward of those who are good in their deeds,

ayahs.textFR: afin qu'Allah leur efface les pires de leurs actions et les récompense selon ce qu'ils auront fait de meilleur.
ayahs.textAR: لِيُكَفِّرَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ أَسْوَأَ الَّذِي عَمِلُوا وَيَجْزِيَهُمْ أَجْرَهُمْ بِأَحْسَنِ الَّذِي كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: so that Allah wipes out from them the worst deeds they did, and gives their reward to them for the best of what they used to do.

ayahs.textFR: Allah ne suffit-Il pas à Son esclave [comme soutien]? Et ils te font peur avec ce qui est en dehors de Lui. Et quiconque Allah égare n'a point de guide.
ayahs.textAR: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِكَافٍ عَبْدَهُ ۖ وَيُخَوِّفُونَكَ بِالَّذِينَ مِنْ دُونِهِ ۚ وَمَنْ يُضْلِلِ اللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ هَادٍ
ayahs.textEN: Is Allah not sufficient for (the protection of) His slave? They are frightening you of those (false gods whom they worship) other than Him. Whomsoever Allah would let go astray, for him there is no one to guide.

ayahs.textFR: Quiconque Allah guide, nul ne peut l'égarer. Allah n'est-Il pas Puissant et Détenteur du pouvoir de châtier?
ayahs.textAR: وَمَنْ يَهْدِ اللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُ مِنْ مُضِلٍّ ۗ أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِعَزِيزٍ ذِي انْتِقَامٍ
ayahs.textEN: And whomsoever Allah gives guidance, for him there is no one to misguide. Is it not that Allah is Mighty, Powerful to avenge?

ayahs.textFR: Si tu leur demandais: «Qui a créé les cieux et la terre?», Ils diraient assurément: «Allah». Dis: «Voyez-vous ceux que vous invoquez en dehors d'Allah; si Allah me voulait du mal, est-ce que [ces divinités] pourraient dissiper Son mal? Ou s'Il me voulait une miséricorde, pourraient-elles retenir Sa miséricorde?» - Dis: «Allah me suffit: c'est en Lui que placent leur confiance ceux qui cherchent un appui».
ayahs.textAR: وَلَئِنْ سَأَلْتَهُمْ مَنْ خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ لَيَقُولُنَّ اللَّهُ ۚ قُلْ أَفَرَأَيْتُمْ مَا تَدْعُونَ مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ إِنْ أَرَادَنِيَ اللَّهُ بِضُرٍّ هَلْ هُنَّ كَاشِفَاتُ ضُرِّهِ أَوْ أَرَادَنِي بِرَحْمَةٍ هَلْ هُنَّ مُمْسِكَاتُ رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ قُلْ حَسْبِيَ اللَّهُ ۖ عَلَيْهِ يَتَوَكَّلُ الْمُتَوَكِّلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: If you ask them as to who created the heavens and the earth, they will certainly say, “Allah.” Say, “Then, tell me about those whom you invoke other than Allah, if Allah intends to cause some harm to me, are they (able) to remove the harm caused by Him? Or if He intends to bless me with mercy, are they (able) to hold back His mercy (from me)?” Say, “Allah is sufficient for me. In Him trust those who (rightly) trust (in someone).”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «O mon peuple, agissez selon votre méthode, moi j'agirai [selon la mienne]. Bientôt vous saurez
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ يَا قَوْمِ اعْمَلُوا عَلَىٰ مَكَانَتِكُمْ إِنِّي عَامِلٌ ۖ فَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “O my people, do at your place (what you are doing). I am to do (what I have been ordered to). Very soon, you will come to know

ayahs.textFR: sur qui s'abattra un châtiment qui l'avilira; et sur qui se justifiera un châtiment durable».
ayahs.textAR: مَنْ يَأْتِيهِ عَذَابٌ يُخْزِيهِ وَيَحِلُّ عَلَيْهِ عَذَابٌ مُقِيمٌ
ayahs.textEN: as to who will be visited by a punishment that will disgrace him, and upon whom a lasting punishment will rest.

ayahs.textFR: Nous t'avons fait descendre le Livre, pour les hommes, en toute vérité. Quiconque se guide [le fait] pour son propre bien; et quiconque s'égare, s'égare à son détriment. Tu n'es nullement responsable [de leurs propres affaires].
ayahs.textAR: إِنَّا أَنْزَلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْكِتَابَ لِلنَّاسِ بِالْحَقِّ ۖ فَمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ فَلِنَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَنْ ضَلَّ فَإِنَّمَا يَضِلُّ عَلَيْهَا ۖ وَمَا أَنْتَ عَلَيْهِمْ بِوَكِيلٍ
ayahs.textEN: We have sent down to you the Book for the people with truth. So, whoever follows the guidance, it is for his own good, and whoever goes astray, he will go astray only to his own detriment - and you are not responsible for them.

ayahs.textFR: Allah reçoit les âmes au moment de leur mort ainsi que celles qui ne meurent pas au cours de leur sommeil. Il retient celles à qui Il a décrété la mort, tandis qu'Il renvoie les autres jusqu'à un terme fixé. Il y a certainement là des preuves pour des gens qui réfléchissent.
ayahs.textAR: اللَّهُ يَتَوَفَّى الْأَنْفُسَ حِينَ مَوْتِهَا وَالَّتِي لَمْ تَمُتْ فِي مَنَامِهَا ۖ فَيُمْسِكُ الَّتِي قَضَىٰ عَلَيْهَا الْمَوْتَ وَيُرْسِلُ الْأُخْرَىٰ إِلَىٰ أَجَلٍ مُسَمًّى ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِقَوْمٍ يَتَفَكَّرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Allah fully takes away the souls (of the people) at the time of their death, and (of) those who do not die, in their sleep. Then He withholds those on whom He had decreed death, and sends others back, up to an appointed term. Surely, in this, there are signs for a people who ponder.

ayahs.textFR: Ont-ils adopté, en dehors d'Allah, des intercesseurs? Dis: «Quoi! Même s'ils ne détiennent rien et sont dépourvus de raison?
ayahs.textAR: أَمِ اتَّخَذُوا مِنْ دُونِ اللَّهِ شُفَعَاءَ ۚ قُلْ أَوَلَوْ كَانُوا لَا يَمْلِكُونَ شَيْئًا وَلَا يَعْقِلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Is it that they have adopted intercessors out of those (whom they invoke) other than Allah? Say, “(Do you take them as intercessors) even though they have no power at all, nor do they understand?”

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «L'intercession toute entière appartient à Allah. A Lui la royauté des cieux et de la terre. Puis c'est vers Lui que vous serez ramenés».
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ لِلَّهِ الشَّفَاعَةُ جَمِيعًا ۖ لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَيْهِ تُرْجَعُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “Intercession belongs entirely to Allah.”

ayahs.textFR: Et quand Allah est mentionné seul (sans associés), les cœurs de ceux qui ne croient pas en l'au-delà se crispent et quand on mentionne ceux qui sont en dehors de Lui, voilà qu'ils se réjouissent.
ayahs.textAR: وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ اشْمَأَزَّتْ قُلُوبُ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ ۖ وَإِذَا ذُكِرَ الَّذِينَ مِنْ دُونِهِ إِذَا هُمْ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: When Allah is mentioned alone, the hearts of those who do not believe in the Hereafter are filled with disgust, and when those (whom they worship) other than Him are mentioned, they become happy forthwith.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «O Allah, Créateur des cieux et de la terre, Connaisseur de tout ce que le monde ignore comme de ce qu'il perçoit, c'est Toi qui jugeras entre Tes serviteurs ce sur quoi ils divergeaient».
ayahs.textAR: قُلِ اللَّهُمَّ فَاطِرَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ عَالِمَ الْغَيْبِ وَالشَّهَادَةِ أَنْتَ تَحْكُمُ بَيْنَ عِبَادِكَ فِي مَا كَانُوا فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “O Allah, the Creator of the heavens and the earth, the Knower of the unseen and the seen, you will judge between Your servants in that about which they used to differ.

ayahs.textFR: Si les injustes possédaient tout ce qui se trouve sur la terre, - et autant encore -, ils l'offriraient comme rançon pour échapper au pire châtiment le Jour de la Résurrection; et leur apparaîtra, de la part d'Allah, ce qu'ils n'avaient jamais imaginé;
ayahs.textAR: وَلَوْ أَنَّ لِلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا مَا فِي الْأَرْضِ جَمِيعًا وَمِثْلَهُ مَعَهُ لَافْتَدَوْا بِهِ مِنْ سُوءِ الْعَذَابِ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ ۚ وَبَدَا لَهُمْ مِنَ اللَّهِ مَا لَمْ يَكُونُوا يَحْتَسِبُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Were the wrongdoers to own all that is on earth, and even twice as much, they would surely seek to ransom themselves with it against the evil punishment on the Day of Judgment. There will appear to them from Allah what they have never imagined.

ayahs.textFR: et leur apparaîtront les méfaits qu'ils ont commis, et ce dont ils se raillaient les enveloppera.
ayahs.textAR: وَبَدَا لَهُمْ سَيِّئَاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا وَحَاقَ بِهِمْ مَا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Unveiled to them will be the evils of what they used to earn; and encircled they will be by what they used to ridicule.

ayahs.textFR: Quand un malheur touche l'homme, il Nous invoque. Quand ensuite Nous lui accordons une faveur de Notre part, il dit: «Je ne la dois qu'à [ma] science». C'est une épreuve, plutôt; mais la plupart d'entre eux ne savent pas.
ayahs.textAR: فَإِذَا مَسَّ الْإِنْسَانَ ضُرٌّ دَعَانَا ثُمَّ إِذَا خَوَّلْنَاهُ نِعْمَةً مِنَّا قَالَ إِنَّمَا أُوتِيتُهُ عَلَىٰ عِلْمٍ ۚ بَلْ هِيَ فِتْنَةٌ وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
ayahs.textEN: When man is visited by a trouble, he prays to Us, but when, after that, We favor him with some blessing from Us, he says, “This is given to me because of (my) knowledge.” No, but this is a trial, yet most of them do not know.

ayahs.textFR: Ainsi parlaient ceux qui vécurent avant eux. Mais ce qu'ils ont acquis ne leur a servi à rien;
ayahs.textAR: قَدْ قَالَهَا الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِهِمْ فَمَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُمْ مَا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
ayahs.textEN: The same was said by those before them, but what they used to earn was of no avail to them,

ayahs.textFR: Ils furent donc atteints par les mauvaises conséquences de leurs acquis. Ceux de ces gens [les Mecquois] qui auront commis l'injustice seront atteints par les mauvaises conséquences de leurs acquis et ils ne pourront s'opposer à la puissance [d'Allah].
ayahs.textAR: فَأَصَابَهُمْ سَيِّئَاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا ۚ وَالَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا مِنْ هَٰؤُلَاءِ سَيُصِيبُهُمْ سَيِّئَاتُ مَا كَسَبُوا وَمَا هُمْ بِمُعْجِزِينَ
ayahs.textEN: and they were overtaken by the evils of what they had earned; and the wrongdoers from these (infidels too) will be overtaken by the evils of what they have earned - and they will not be able to escape.

ayahs.textFR: Ne savent-ils pas qu'Allah attribue Ses dons avec largesse ou les restreint à qui Il veut? Il y a en cela des preuves pour des gens qui croient.
ayahs.textAR: أَوَلَمْ يَعْلَمُوا أَنَّ اللَّهَ يَبْسُطُ الرِّزْقَ لِمَنْ يَشَاءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Do they not know that it is Allah who extends provision to whomsoever He wills, and straitens (it for whomsoever He wills). Surely in that, there are signs for a people who believe.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «O Mes serviteurs qui avez commis des excès à votre propre détriment, ne désespérez pas de la miséricorde d'Allah. Car Allah pardonne tous les péchés. Oui, c'est Lui le Pardonneur, le Très Miséricordieux.
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ يَا عِبَادِيَ الَّذِينَ أَسْرَفُوا عَلَىٰ أَنْفُسِهِمْ لَا تَقْنَطُوا مِنْ رَحْمَةِ اللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ يَغْفِرُ الذُّنُوبَ جَمِيعًا ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
ayahs.textEN: Say (on My behalf), “O servants of Mine who have acted recklessly against their own selves, do not despair of Allah’s mercy. Surely, Allah will forgive all sins. Surely, He is the One who is the Most-Forgiving, the Very-Merciful.

ayahs.textFR: Et revenez repentant à votre Seigneur, et soumettez-vous à Lui, avant que ne vous vienne le châtiment et vous ne recevez alors aucun secours.
ayahs.textAR: وَأَنِيبُوا إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُمْ وَأَسْلِمُوا لَهُ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَكُمُ الْعَذَابُ ثُمَّ لَا تُنْصَرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Turn passionately towards your Lord, and submit to Him before the punishment comes to you, after which you will not be helped.

ayahs.textFR: Et suivez la meilleure révélation qui vous est descendue de la part de votre Seigneur, avant que le châtiment ne vous vienne soudain, sans que vous ne [le] pressentiez;
ayahs.textAR: وَاتَّبِعُوا أَحْسَنَ مَا أُنْزِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ مِنْ رَبِّكُمْ مِنْ قَبْلِ أَنْ يَأْتِيَكُمُ الْعَذَابُ بَغْتَةً وَأَنْتُمْ لَا تَشْعُرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And follow the best of what has been sent down to you from your Lord before the punishment comes to you suddenly when you do not even expect,

ayahs.textFR: avant qu'une âme ne dise: «Malheur à moi pour mes manquements envers Allah. Car j'ai été certes, parmi les railleurs»
ayahs.textAR: أَنْ تَقُولَ نَفْسٌ يَا حَسْرَتَا عَلَىٰ مَا فَرَّطْتُ فِي جَنْبِ اللَّهِ وَإِنْ كُنْتُ لَمِنَ السَّاخِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: lest someone should say, “Pity on me, because I fell short in respect of (observing the rights of) Allah and in fact, I was one of those who mocked”,

ayahs.textFR: ou qu'elle ne dise: «Si Allah m'avait guidée, j'aurais été certes, parmi les pieux»
ayahs.textAR: أَوْ تَقُولَ لَوْ أَنَّ اللَّهَ هَدَانِي لَكُنْتُ مِنَ الْمُتَّقِينَ
ayahs.textEN: or, (lest) someone should say, “If Allah were to show me the way, I would have surely been among those who fear Allah”,

ayahs.textFR: ou bien qu'elle ne dise en voyant le châtiment: «Ah! S'il y avait pour moi un retour! Je serais alors parmi les bienfaisants».
ayahs.textAR: أَوْ تَقُولَ حِينَ تَرَى الْعَذَابَ لَوْ أَنَّ لِي كَرَّةً فَأَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُحْسِنِينَ
ayahs.textEN: or, (lest) someone should say when he sees the punishment, “Would that I have a chance to return, so that I may become one of those who are good in their deeds.”

ayahs.textFR: «Oh que si! Mes versets te sont venus et tu les as traités de mensonge, tu t'es enflé d'orgueil et tu étais parmi les mécréants».
ayahs.textAR: بَلَىٰ قَدْ جَاءَتْكَ آيَاتِي فَكَذَّبْتَ بِهَا وَاسْتَكْبَرْتَ وَكُنْتَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: No! My verses had reached you, but you called them untrue, and waxed proud, and became of those who disbelieved.

ayahs.textFR: Et au Jour de la Résurrection, tu verras les visages de ceux qui mentaient sur Allah, assombris. N'est-ce pas dans l'Enfer qu'il y aura une demeure pour les orgueilleux?
ayahs.textAR: وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ تَرَى الَّذِينَ كَذَبُوا عَلَى اللَّهِ وُجُوهُهُمْ مُسْوَدَّةٌ ۚ أَلَيْسَ فِي جَهَنَّمَ مَثْوًى لِلْمُتَكَبِّرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: And on the Day of Judgment, you will see those who had forged lies against Allah (in a state) that their faces are turned black. Is it not that in Jahannam there is an abode for the arrogant?

ayahs.textFR: Et Allah sauvera ceux qui ont été pieux en leur faisant gagner [leur place au Paradis]. Nul mal ne les touchera et ils ne seront point affligés.
ayahs.textAR: وَيُنَجِّي اللَّهُ الَّذِينَ اتَّقَوْا بِمَفَازَتِهِمْ لَا يَمَسُّهُمُ السُّوءُ وَلَا هُمْ يَحْزَنُونَ
ayahs.textEN: And Allah will save the God-fearing (from Jahannam ), with utmost success granted to them, so as no evil will touch them, nor will they grieve.

ayahs.textFR: Allah est le Créateur de toute chose, et de toute chose Il est Garant.
ayahs.textAR: اللَّهُ خَالِقُ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ ۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَكِيلٌ
ayahs.textEN: Allah is Creator of everything, and He is the Guardian over everything.

ayahs.textFR: Il détient les clefs des cieux et de la terre; et ceux qui ne croient pas aux versets d'Allah, ce sont ceux-là les perdants.
ayahs.textAR: لَهُ مَقَالِيدُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۗ وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِ اللَّهِ أُولَٰئِكَ هُمُ الْخَاسِرُونَ
ayahs.textEN: To Him belong the keys to the heavens and the earth. As for those who have rejected the verses of Allah, it is they who are the losers.

ayahs.textFR: Dis: «Me commanderez-vous d'adorer autre qu'Allah, O ignorants?»
ayahs.textAR: قُلْ أَفَغَيْرَ اللَّهِ تَأْمُرُونِّي أَعْبُدُ أَيُّهَا الْجَاهِلُونَ
ayahs.textEN: Say, “Is it, then, someone other than Allah that you ask me to worship, O ignorant people?”

ayahs.textFR: En effet, il t'a été révélé, ainsi qu'à ceux qui t'ont précédé: «Si tu donnes des associés à Allah, ton œuvre sera certes vaine; et tu seras très certainement du nombre des perdants.
ayahs.textAR: وَلَقَدْ أُوحِيَ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى الَّذِينَ مِنْ قَبْلِكَ لَئِنْ أَشْرَكْتَ لَيَحْبَطَنَّ عَمَلُكَ وَلَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْخَاسِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: It has already been revealed to you and to those before you (that): If you associate (partners with Allah), your deeds shall be rendered useless, and you shall be among the losers.

ayahs.textFR: Tout au contraire, adore Allah seul et sois du nombre des reconnaissants».
ayahs.textAR: بَلِ اللَّهَ فَاعْبُدْ وَكُنْ مِنَ الشَّاكِرِينَ
ayahs.textEN: On the contrary, it is Allah whom you should worship; and be among the grateful.

ayahs.textFR: Ils n'ont pas estimé Allah comme Il devrait l'être alors qu'au Jour de la Résurrection, Il fera de la terre entière une poignée, et les cieux seront pliés dans Sa [main] droite. Gloire à Lui! Il est au-dessus de ce qu'ils Lui associent.
ayahs.textAR: وَمَا قَدَرُوا اللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدْرِهِ وَالْأَرْضُ جَمِيعًا قَبْضَتُهُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَالسَّمَاوَاتُ مَطْوِيَّاتٌ بِيَمِينِهِ ۚ سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَعَالَىٰ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
ayahs.textEN: They did not hold Allah in His true esteem. The whole earth will be in a single grip of His hand on the Day of Doom, and the heavens (will be) rolled up on his right hand. Pure is He, far too higher than what they associate with Him.
